website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and compact scope that puts out a very bright red laser, although you may find yourself going through batteries.
pros: Red laser is for use with most firearms
Modes include constant on and strobe
cons: Some found this option hard to sight in, and that it drifted too much
The switch can be difficult to activate quickly

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! This thing is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This thing is amazing!!! I don't usually write product reviews, but I felt compelled with this item. It's lightweight, compact, easy to install and use, easy to adjust its accuracy, and is remarkably accurate and has great range!!! No need to ever purchase a more expensive and bulky laser sight; this one does the job and then some!!! 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: brokerbevo

customer_reviews.title: ... for my Glock 19 5th generation and it fit perfect. Went on without a problem and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my Glock 19 5th generation and it fit perfect. Went on without a problem and looks great. It's well made and works perfect. Don't let the price fool you, You will not regret buying this great laser. I would buy this again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: William Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Fit Walther P22 well.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Walther P22. It fit snugly, was easy to install and zero, and you can break down the pistol for cleaning with out the sight being in the way. Fired about 80 rounds through it and the sight stayed wear I set it.
customer_reviews.author: William  Eppright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and great value
customer_reviews.text: The Abe Advance Optics HG54R-1 Laser is a excellent laser and a great value. I have a much higher end laser (5x the cost) and I can say this one works as well as that one. Comes with a battery, battery cap slot tightener and two allen wrenches. Easily attached to my Taurus HD pistol and was simple to adjust the laser to zero on a target. If you are looking for a great value in a laser then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor X

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and to set. Fit perfectly on my girlfriends Taurus G2c 9mm.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this laser!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It dialed in nicely on my millennium G2. I've not had a lot of experience with a gun but I loved this gun. Now my husband purchased this laser for me so I can hopefully do better with my shooting. Love the quality of this product too.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Legler

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: No drift after 150 rounds through my 9mm Ruger SR9. Seems solidly mounted. Easy to sight in with separate adjustments for elevation and windage. Reasonably bright as red lasers go -- but I generally shoot indoors. May be limited in visibility in full sunlight. Strobe mode is nice to save on battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Owings

customer_reviews.title: Fits a s&w nice looks good on the gun overall great working product ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits a s&w nice looks good on the gun overall great working product Will most definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Physically smaller than others which I like for a handgun
customer_reviews.text: Sitting on my M&P9 M2. Quite bright. Physically smaller than others which I like for a handgun. Easily zeroed in with both H & V adjustments. I need to shoot with it to see how it stays in place and will report back.
customer_reviews.author: DaStr8tPoop

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to sight in.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! Very bright and easy to sight in. Haven't taken it to the range yet to see how it holds up, but I will update once I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly on 12 gauge Shockwave
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this to a 12 gauge Shockwave and it works perfectly. The only drawback is that it is a little hard to pick up the laser in bright sun light. It has 2 on/off buttons that are conveniently placed at the back that makes it easy to operate. It has not moved since I installed it and it has held zero without a single problem. It had handled the recoil of 00 buck and high velocity with not a single issue. I am really happy the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit more expensive than other junk lasers
customer_reviews.text: This laser went on and appeared to zero just fine, until I took it to the range. It won't hold zero, which makes it worse than useless. It makes it dangerous. This is the second "budget" laser I purchased, this one being just a bit more expensive than the previous one which literally fell apart. This one will still serve to entertain the dogs. Save your money and just buy a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Paul SoutarTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Only shows up at night
customer_reviews.text: Laser only shows up at night...cant even see it on dark, cloudy days or dusk. I would only use & recommend for specific night home defense only. It is useless at the Gun Range, you cant even see it at 25 yards... I will mount it to my Mossberg 500 for home defense only. I use regular sites at the range instead. Price was OK though.
customer_reviews.author: Ivar the boneless

customer_reviews.title: Fits Taurus 24/7 G2C .45 perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Was easy to install, easy to adjust. Great product for the price. Fits my Taurus 24/7 G2 Compact .45 very well. Very bright laser. No problem seeing it in a well lit room. Very light weight and compact design.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best Laser I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Great for pistols or crossbows that have rails. I use the green and red on my Ghost 410 which I have set up for day and night hunting with night vision and the accuracy with them is EXCEPTIONAL (day or night). Both scopes I use easily pick the lasers up, day and night. Just as good if not better than my $150 plus laser. Will buy ADE Optics in the future. In fact I bought the same model in the green laser. These things are better than sliced bread. Try it you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: JimE

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this laser, I used a quarter and eye balled it next to my 1911. The product picture shows a quarter on top of the laser for size reference, but I was very surprised at how compact this laser is. The construction looks very nice, the button is easy the reach, and the red dot is bright and focused. For $50 I'm extremely happy! Now I just need to take it out and see how it performs. If there are any issues with holding zero I will update this review. Thank you ADE for making such a nice and affordable laser!
customer_reviews.author: jon3030

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery? ***UPDATE***
customer_reviews.text: This laser sight looks very well made and it's easy to install. HOWEVER, once I turn on the laser it goes from very bright to dim in a matter of 10 seconds. I'm not sure if it's a defective battery or the device is defective?? I sent the seller an email to see if I can get a new battery (CR1/3N). I'll update this post and rating if/when I hear back from the seller...stay tuned. UPDATE: The seller has reached out to me and is sending me a new battery. I'm happy now.
customer_reviews.author: TimRsmdt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light. I have a Glock 19 (Gen 4)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. I have a Glock 19 (Gen 4), and the only struggling was entirely my own. It slides on and clicks very easily, and the box includes the tools you may need to adjust it, as well as to easily take the battery in and out. It holds well and shines a bright laser where you need it to for fairly cheap, there's no reason not to get it if you're looking for a handgun laser.
customer_reviews.author: James Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Ade Advanced Optics HG54R1 Universl Laser
customer_reviews.text: Put this on Mossberg Shockwave after I had to send Truglo back due to lack of windage adjustment. Had this one adjusted in about 2 minutes. Windage adjustment is very sensitive. Turn allen wrench very slowly. Nice bright red laser with strobing fuction.
customer_reviews.author: FaSSBlac

customer_reviews.title: Great value !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value ! Solid, I only buy premium lasers but I thought I take a chance on this one, so far so good surprisingly good built and quality will test more and then will order a green one :)
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The product was easily installed based on instructions provided in English only (wonderful). I am completely satisfied with ADE Optical and would recommend it to others. I had mentioned to my wife some time ago that I would like to have one for my 40 cal. Glock. She surprised me with one for my birthday. It does exactly what the manual said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect add on for a pistol crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Great product... easy to mount (over or under), and fully adjustable. Beam is very clear... even in the noon sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: kiddo

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: seems as good, or better than similar models i have previously purchased at a higher price. Would/will buy again, if/when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay on Taurus G2C pistol
customer_reviews.text: I have installed it 4 times and tightened it as tight as it will go, Yet after firing several rounds it ends up on the floor. I emailed the company but got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time or money, every time you change the clip you got to resight it
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a glock 19, uses one CR-1/3N battery
customer_reviews.text: Feels firm. I have small hands but the on/off button was comfortably in reach of my index finger. Beam is adjustable left right up and down. Conflicting description info. This uses one CR-1/3N battery.
customer_reviews.author: someguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! Was dead on, all I had to do was unpack add the battery’s and fix to my H&K VP 40! Spot on after 200 rounds!
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal adjustment screw has no effect
customer_reviews.text: Unable to adjust beam horizontally which renders sight unusable. Gave it 2 stars because it looks cool on my Glock 19. Unfortunately I did not install it right away and it is too late to return it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: hlb

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came missing elevation set screw, seller promptly shipped 2 grub set screws that came a couple days later after I messaged them. Happy with the product it looks good on my XD and would have rated it four or five stars if it would have came with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: So Easy to Install....Perfect Fit...Site's in about 5 Minutes...Bang For Buck!
customer_reviews.author: BEN666

customer_reviews.title: Spot On
customer_reviews.text: This laser is perfect! It feels well built but it won’t weigh down the end of the gun. The light is very bright and works well enough in daylight to give you a good shot. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: David I Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Got it installed, stayed zeroed, so much easier than using the fixed sights. This sight went on the bottom rail of a HK VP9. works great. did have to get a new holster to accommodate the laser sight, but worth it. Easy to quickly drill a tight pattern at 10 yards.
customer_reviews.author: MATT ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Easy bright laser
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on a Glock 17 gen 5. Easy to adjust with the included hex keys. Does NOT turn on by itself in the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Lee Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great sight for the price
customer_reviews.text: This laser is actually pretty great, I’ve seen other lasers that cost double the price. This basically performs the exact same functions, it’s also pretty bright. Definitely Would recommend this to anyone looking for a laser.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good for such a price
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these on an Smith and Wesson M&P that I use for home protection. It is effective for household distances -- plus is easy to sight in (simply hold the iron sights on a target and adjust the laser to match. Mounting and sighting-in took five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. LeDu

customer_reviews.title: will pop off during shooting with Taurus G2c.
customer_reviews.text: after no more than 10 rounds the laser fell off. it is not a bad product for a full size gun. i don't think it fits compacts well, at least not the Taurus G2c. feel off at the range. should include that in the description that it doesn't fit G2c. it is also hard to find holster to fit it .
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleekness of the sight, It fit my S&W perfectly. Easy to follow instructions and set up was simple. Would highly recommended it to any pistol owner.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in position
customer_reviews.text: Did not work correctly at all for me. Mounted on a Taurus G2C 9 MM. When I fired the gun it moved a lot, completely throwing it out of the alignment that I had set. I adjusted it and tried again, same result. With the clamp tightened you can move the unit from left to right simply by pushing on it. Seems to have a design flaw that keeps it from staying in position. I have absolutely no confidence in this laser. I am returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: barnstormer37

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the low price fool you
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my glock 45 9mm laser is nice and bright easy to install just wish it was a little longer so the locking pins and the grooves lined up. Over all the build quality and packaging is excellent, on and off buttons on both sides it will work for left or right handed shooters.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and its functionality it good however the conformity to my Walter PK380 is not the best. The on button comes to close in on the trigger guard and if you adjust it out it's not easy to activate the laser.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Botello

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit my Taurus properly or adjust to my weapon.
customer_reviews.text: Said it would fit a Taurus model. Bearly does. The quality is good for value. I am disappointed that it mention it would fit. I will keep and try on another model of weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Barry LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Fair value for working laser sight.
customer_reviews.text: I previously reviewed this sight incorrectly. After readjusting laser and locktighting the mounting screw, the laser is now holding a reasonable zero (2 inch group) @ 30 feet. Fine for my SAR 9mm.
customer_reviews.author: 1busydad

customer_reviews.title: Laserific!
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to install and adjust. Not only great for my 300 Blackout Rifle but amazing for distracting my Bernese Mountain Dog.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Mounts easily and easy to turn on with either hand. I put it on a Mossberg Shockwave and bore sighted it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: BANG for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Well made, horizontal and vertical adjustments, very easy to sight in. Great Product, bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Barry G.

customer_reviews.title: No impressed
customer_reviews.text: Won't hold zero on anything I put it on. I want to love it. Just don't know what to do
customer_reviews.author: dperry

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit on a Sig P365xl
customer_reviews.text: I went cheap and bought this for my sig saucer P365xl, but it doesn’t fit on that pistol. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value
customer_reviews.text: I was not looking to spend $150 or more for a laser sight. You can't beat this for the price. Solid product and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: PawlieB

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Simple install with all tools required to install and calibrate already included. Gets the job done. Wide adjustment range.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...It was easy to install, it functions like it stated, devliery was on time and it was relatively inexpensive. Great product. If given the chance yes I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Neely

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great price ..great quality....there wasnt anything i didnt like about this product. Feels perfect on the gun...installed on a taurus g2c. Ready to go check this product out soon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Schniesta

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, easy to use, accurate and cheap price
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what i was looking for. slides right onto rails, has on/off button on both sides of pistol. works great !!
customer_reviews.author: paul marcot

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping took awhile but I received it today and fits perfect on my Glock 30s. Can't wait to try it out in the field. Also fits perfect in my new holster👍
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mid level laser for my edc. Its accurate shoots fair. It does jump around a bit if you dont have it properly installed and buttoned down. Overall i would recommend it just know that it is just a great entry level laser
customer_reviews.author: Deangelo H.

customer_reviews.title: Good price Laser site for a BB Gun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laser site that I attached to my BB pistol. It was easy to attach to the picatinny rail and easy to adjust. Greatly improved the accuracy of my shots. For the price point it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Morlock

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you own a Taurus pt111 or g2c
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay on the rail, recoil cause laser to fall off.

customer_reviews.title: Good, very well designed product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy install! Comes with a battery and takes a minute to install. Good design that fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Indoors only
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're shooting indoors only your search continues. Does not carry a laser visible enough for daytime outdoor use
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Easy. Looks like mfg install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install works perfect for my Walter P22 and my Ruger SR22. A must have for home defense!

customer_reviews.title: Great add on
customer_reviews.text: Great fit easy to install... Really good laser and excellent price

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, easy install and looks great. Still fits in my holster even with the sight attached

customer_reviews.title: That both Allen wrenches are included. One is small don’t miss it. AQ26V3
customer_reviews.text: First lazer I have purchased and was easy to install. Lazer powerful even in sunlight. Easy to adjust as tools todo so included. Going to love shooting with it.
customer_reviews.author: Don J. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Holds zero
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap laser, easy to mount in SR22, still has zero at 300 rounds, still working great.
customer_reviews.author: M Probert

customer_reviews.title: 100% wash out in sunlight
customer_reviews.text: Completely washes out in sunlight. Read many reviews with "brightest laser", maybe I received a defected item. Indoor it's very bright, outdoor in sunlight impossible to see.

customer_reviews.title: Great laser for the price
customer_reviews.text: This laser was easy to mount and the dot is clear and there is no trail even in complete darkness.

customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this to work but after a few rounds at the range the lazer continuined to fly off the gun tighten it up so tight I broke the screw off in the laser ended up throwing it away very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: That it works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Have to take it to the range to get this sight bored in accurately, but this laser sight is pretty good for the price! No regrets on this purchase, Great for home defense! Very happy with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This laser was on my gun for 2 months. I shot with it one time about 5 rounds. I went to shoot a second time and the laser didn’t work anymore...I ordered batteries thinking I might have left the sight on...no use..it was not the batteries...waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Brian Emlinger

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Laser for CZ P10F
customer_reviews.text: With so many options in so many price ranges, this is definitely the best bang for your money. It is sturdy and it comes with the battery and the hex tools required for installation and calibration. Holds zero like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: Good for hip shooting
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Mossberg Shockwave, since this gun is shot from the hip. Helps to put it on target.

customer_reviews.title: Ade laser sight.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these ADE laser sights. A green and a red. Both work very well and I'm pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great laser sight! Works great, hold a decent zero, easy to use design, ambidextrous, seems durable for its weight. I’ll have one for every gun soon enough because of the picatinny design.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Does not want to hold zero
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Does not want to hold zero. However, that may due to the front stock I have use it on. Need to get more range time to give a solid answer.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of box
customer_reviews.text: Opened my product and it did not work. Now I am searching for a battery. No one Carrie's this battery so it looks like product will be returned.

customer_reviews.title: It does first on my pistol
customer_reviews.text: It fits on my taurus g2c, the laser has to be continually reset.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price
customer_reviews.text: Been 2 days since I installed on my Glock 19 gen 3. Fits perfect and it very small and compact . Laser is super bright and is on point , on/off buttons on the side are really nice. Overall very

customer_reviews.text: bright laser but stopped working after used one time changing the battery did not help

customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ade optical and extremely satisfied with both. Extremely easy to use. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is easy to install. Works great with my Taurus G2. I would highly recommend this product to any one.

customer_reviews.text: Fits in my holster still. No problems installing it. Small and fits gun.

customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box you could tell it was solid. Bright, easy to install. Mounted perfectly on my EP9 Pistol.

customer_reviews.text: I used for my AR, for some target shooting. Its compact and easy to install! I will be getting more for other rifles.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great little laser sight. Very bright and small. I am very satisfied with my purchase.

product_meta.title: Ade Advanced Optics HG54R-1 Universal Laser Sight, Red
product_meta.description: Ade Advanced Optics first made its appearance in the firearms accessory industry by doing private label production for several Major manufacturers and retailers. During this period, Ade Advanced Optics began receiving requests from numerous customers for access to the affordable, high quality products that Ade Advanced Optics was capable of producing. By soliciting feedback from both clients and end users, Ade Advanced Optics was able to overcome the challenges a new company often faces when entering a global market and industry, especially one as competitive as the shooting, hunting, and outdoors industry.
feature_bullets: Offers the brightest Red laser allowed by Law. Non-handheld class 3R laser product, < 5Mw power output. Ultra lightweight and compact 1.79"L x 1.06"W x .85"H
Fit rail-equipped pistols, rifles and shotguns. The laser sight fits onto virtually any firearm with a modern (M1913 Pica tinny or Weaver-style) accessory rail

Proprietary mounting design provides two spring loaded pillar to push to rail slot for rock solid zero movement. Weight: 1.13oz (Battery included). Does NOT fits Berreta due to extra wide trigger guard.
Operates with one CR1/3N batteries(included). Battery life: 1 hours. The unit is quickly and easily, user-installed in moments and can be painlessly transferred from firearm to firearm
Controlled by ambidextrous switch. It offers two modes: constant-on and strobe. This allows the user to easily set their mode based on personal need or preference
